title: National Government Services Portal
description: National Government Services Portal of India provides single window access to services offered by the various Indian Government entities. This Portal is an initiative under the India Portal Project and has been designed and developed by National Informatics Centre (NIC), Ministry of Electronics & Information Technology, Government of India.

items.title: Apply for Senior Citizen Pilgrimage Scheme, Rajasthan
items.description: The Rajasthan Senior Citizen Pilgrimage Scheme, also known as the Mukhyamantri Tirth Yatra Yojana, provides free pilgrimage trips for senior citizens in Rajasthan. The scheme covers the cost of travel (train or flight), accommodation, and food, allowing eligible individuals to visit various religious sites both within and outside the state.

items.title: Book Online Packages for Lakshadweep Tourism
items.description: Tourists can book online travel packages for Lakshadweep, including popular options like Samudram packages, Bangaram Island stays, Kavaratti Island resorts, and scuba diving adventures. This service ensures hassle-free planning for visitors seeking a memorable island experience.

items.title: STARS e-Ticketing Services, Andaman and Nicobar Administration
items.description: The Andaman and Nicobar Administration's STARS portal facilitates online ship ticket reservations for foreshore, inter-island, and mainland routes. It offers a convenient booking experience for travelers.

items.title: Registration of Hotelier, Odisha
items.description: Enroll as a hotelier with Odisha Tourism, where you can showcase your hotel's information, promotions, and special offers to a global audience, expanding your reach and visibility.

items.title: Registration of Travel Agent, Odisha
items.description: Register as a travel agent, a travel agent is a private retailer or public service that provides travel and tourism-related services to the general public on behalf of accommodation or travel suppliers to offer different kinds of travelling packages for each destination.

items.title: Booking of ECO-Retreat Destinations, Odisha
items.description: Book eco-retreat destinations, the luxurious glamping event on the Ramchandi beach is a perfect escapade for solitude seekers. A leisurely drive along the Puri-Konark marine drive & visiting heritage monument Konark temple would be an enchanting experience.

items.title: Search Indian Fairs and Festivals Upcoming Events, Past Events and All Events
items.description: The Utsav Portal, initiated by the Ministry of Tourism, is a digital platform designed to spotlight festivals, events, and live darshans throughout India. Its primary objective is to boost tourism in various regions of the country and elevate their status as sought-after tourist spots. The portal serves as a comprehensive resource offering up-to-date details on fairs and festivals, presenting month-wise and state-wise event calendars for easy reference.

items.title: Online Tourist Registration and Booking, Andaman and Nicobar Island
items.description: Citizen who wish to avail ticketing service has to register by providing his/her personal details along with correct mobile number. No user is allowed to register more than once with the same mobile number.

items.title: Obtaining Entry Permit to Lakshadweep
items.description: According to the Laccadive, Minicoy and Amindivi Islands (Restriction on Entry and Residence) Rules, 1967, every person, who is not a native of these islands, shall have to obtain a permit in the Prescribed Form from the Competent authority, for entering into and residing in these islands. Only the Government Officials and Armed Force members working or visiting these islands and their family members are exempted from this.

items.title: Goa State Portal
items.description: The official web portal for the Government of Goa state government. Information about the government departments, their functions, and services is provided. Details of initiatives, budget, and government orders are given. Information is also provided on the famous tourist destinations, population, area etc.

items.title: Recruitment of Daastan-e-Shahadat, Punjab
items.description: The Department of Tourism & Cultural Affairs through Punjab Heritage & Tourism Promotion Board invites on-line applications from eligible candidates for recruitment to the following posts as per minimum wages announced by Government of Punjab from time-to-time on purely Contract basis to be deployed in the Daastan-e-Shahadat Museum at Sri Chamkaur Sahib, District Ropar, Punjab

items.title: Tented Accommodation and Camping Site, Punjab
items.description: The objecive of the scheme is to provide suitable accommodation to the domestic and foreign tourists interested in eco, adventure, wildlife, and pilgrimage tourism. The growing footfall of tourists in Punjab has increased the requirement of accommodation units at different tourist destinations. Since permanent construction in the protected areas is either not permissible or not feasible, therefore, in order to meet the demand of tourists, camping facilities and tented accommodation can be a good...

items.title: Bed and Breakfast Homestay Scheme, Punjab
items.description: With the aim of providing comfortable Bed & Breakfast (BnB)/Home Stay facilities and to supplement the availabilty of accommodation across the state, Department of Tourism registers fully operational rooms of private properties as Bed & Breakfast HomeStay units in the state of Punjab.

items.title: Check Ship Ticket Status, Lakshadweep
items.description: Check online Ship Ticket Status by Web Based Ship Ticket Advance Reservation Lakshadweep.

items.title: Check Seats available (Point to Point) for next Two Months, Lakshadweep
items.description: Get services for Check Seats available (Point to Point) for next Two Months, Lakshadweep

items.title: Know about Ship Schedule by Webstar, Lakshadweep
items.description: Get services for Know about Ship Schedule by Webstar, Lakshadweep

items.title: Apply for Web Based Ship Ticket Advance Reservation, Lakshadweep
items.description: Get services for Web Based Ship Ticket Advance Reservation, Lakshadweep

items.title: Winter Helicopter Service in Kargil, Leh for General Public, Ladakh
items.description: Get services for Online Booking by Ladakh Heli Services such as Leh, Drass, Kargil, Lingshed, Nyerak, Padum, Zanskar etc.

items.title: Apply for Helicopter Yatra to Shri Kedarnath Dham
items.description: Get services for Chardham Yatra Registration on Uttarakhand Govt. Portal is mandatory to book Helicopter Service online.

items.title: Apply online Char Dham Yatra and Hemkund Sahib Registration, Uttarakhand
items.description: Online services for Char Dham Yatra and Hemkund Sahib Registration. There is no fee involved in the Tourist registration process.
